definition: to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)

sentences.english: Photo taken at Buddha Park, also known as Wat Xieng Khuan 25 km southeast from Vientiane.
sentences.chinese: 在佛公園攝，也寺昆萬象25公里東南衆所周知的。

sentences.english: Do not forget to keep the subject within the parallax correction mark.
sentences.chinese: 別忘了讓被攝主體保持在視差糾正線之內。

sentences.english: If a subject contains a lot of white, it can easily be overexposed.
sentences.chinese: 如果被攝物體有很多的白色，就很有可能過曝。

sentences.english: Research on optoelectronic characteristic of home-made si vidicon is carried out.
sentences.chinese: 對國產硅靶攝象管的光電特性進行了研究測試。

sentences.english: This scene is by no means easy to shoot.
It is well regarded as an accurate way to measure your VO2 max.
sentences.chinese: 它被認爲是測量最大攝氧量的一個準確途徑。

sentences.english: Photo of water bottles. The minimum drinking water supply is 1 gallon per person per day.
sentences.chinese: 每人每天最低攝水量是1加侖。

sentences.english: I have a camcorder for personal use.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個自由的攝錄影機。

sentences.english: Placing your subject always in the middle of the frame.
sentences.chinese: 讓被攝主體處於取景框最中央。

sentences.english: According to my photos, I am glad you like it, I wish you peace and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我所攝的相片，很歡喜汝的恰意，並祝汝平安佮快樂。

sentences.english: A bank of telephoto lenses homed in on him.
sentences.chinese: 一整排的遠攝鏡頭都對準了他。
請用相機攝，不要用槍射。

sentences.english: This paper states briefly the development history of the all-electro static camera tube.
sentences.chinese: 本文簡要地敘述了全靜電式攝象管的發展歷史。

sentences.english: Photographers use light meters to measure the amount of light that is reflected from the object they want to photograph.
sentences.chinese: 攝影師用暴光表，測量從被攝物體反射回的光的強度。

sentences.english: Become a picture director, not just a passive picture-taker.
sentences.chinese: 成爲照片拍攝指導，不僅僅是一個積極的攝相者。
